definition: seat of government/government repository (archive)/official residence/mansion/presidential palace/(honorific) Your home/prefecture (from Tang to Qing times)
Nationalist government 1920s-1949 under Chiang Kai-shek 蔣介石|蒋介石
British colonial administration of Hong Kong 1837-1941 and 1945-1997
Liaison Office of the Central People's Government in the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region
pinyin: Zhong1 yang1 Ren2 min2 Zheng4 fu3 Zhu4 Xiang1 gang3 Te4 bie2 Xing2 zheng4 qu1 Lian2 luo4 Ban4 gong1 shi4
containing_words.word: 中央人民政府驻香港特别行政区联络办公室

sentences.english: It's got a new government, you know, which hasn't governed before.
sentences.chinese: 它刚换了政府，一个从未执政过的新政府。

sentences.english: It's got a new government, you know, which hasn't governed before.
sentences.chinese: 它刚换了政府，一个从未执政过的新政府。

sentences.english: Pray for the government to halt its campaign of targeting Christians .
sentences.chinese: 祷告政府会停止以基督徒为箭靶的活动。

sentences.english: They never allowed the government to develop trains.
sentences.chinese: 它们绝不允许政府开发铁路。

sentences.english: For years, the government has been buoying up cotton prices.
sentences.chinese: 多年来政府一直保持棉花高价格。

sentences.english: China's fertility rate may be much lower than official estimates.
sentences.chinese: 中国人口高增长率可能会比政府估计的要低很多。

sentences.english: The tolls, which include a government passage tax, varied from $4 to $30 per vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 隧道收费连政府通过税，每程由4元至30元不等。

sentences.english: The new premier is forming his government mainly from young men.
sentences.chinese: 这位新总理主要从年轻人中物色人选组建政府。

sentences.english: The government brought two hundred eighty-five charges against him, mostly for murder.
sentences.chinese: 政府对他提出二百八十五费，主要用于谋杀。

sentences.english: Lobbyists use slush fund to bribe public officials.
sentences.chinese: 院外集团的说客用贿金拉拢政府官员。

sentences.english: He also became embroiled in controversy surrounding the government bail-out of Chrysler.
sentences.chinese: 同时他也因政府保释克莱斯勒而被卷入巨大争议。

sentences.english: The atmosphere in the early hours of Tuesday's anti-government rally was friendly.
sentences.chinese: 在周二的反政府集会凌晨气氛友好。

sentences.english: The onus now is on the government of Pakistan to act with sincerity.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦政府现在有责任采取有诚意的行动。

sentences.english: What kind of government will bel behind for his successor?
sentences.chinese: 他将留给后任一个什么样的政府呢？

sentences.english: He was sure, he said diplomatically, that the government would do all it could.
sentences.chinese: 梁先生曾婉转表示，他确信政府已经尽力。

sentences.english: The president's attempt to correct governmental abuses is successful.
sentences.chinese: 总统为匡正政府弊端而做的努力颇有成效。
